name: Goblin (KaleidioMakes)
description:
Buried in the sand centuries ago was a race of kobolds whose magic grew distaste from the gods.  Soon their city was buried.

But then, historians dug the site up, only to discover the place was cursed to bring wrath upon anybody after its richest room; the gold vault.

You are a little luckier than the rest.  Can you utilize magic to defeat the sentient curse and gain the riches of old?
